summary: Clifford A. Fenton, Jr. is identified through payroll records from the Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The documents include a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records and payroll authorization forms for Fenton, detailing his employment with the HSCA. While the specific role Fenton held within the HSCA is not explicitly stated in the provided summaries, the payroll records confirm his employment with the committee. The other documents do not mention him.
significance: Clifford A. Fenton, Jr.'s significance lies in his employment with the HSCA, the committee tasked with investigating the JFK assassination. His payroll records are part of the official documentation related to the HSCA's operations and are subject to review and release under the Assassination Records Review Board.
